data.title: The Midnight Ghost Train - The Midnight Ghost Train
data.meta_description: Click 'Select Options' -> 'Add to cart.' ⚠️ NOTE!! ⚠️ THIS PRODUCT SHIPS REGISTRED AND TRACKED TO THE COUNTRIES LISTED BELOW...
data.text:
Click 'Select Options' -> 'Add to cart.'

⚠️ NOTE!! ⚠️

THIS PRODUCT SHIPS REGISTRED AND TRACKED TO THE COUNTRIES LISTED BELOW WITH OUR PARTNER PACKET-UP.COM! DO NOT ADD PRIORITY SHIPPING!

Tracked shipping to (rest is shipped as registred so you have to sign the delivery):

Ireland

Austria

Belgium

Denmark

Estonia

Spain

Italy

United Kingdom

US

Canada

Latvia

Poland

Netherlands

Portugal

France

Finland

Switzerland

Sweden

Germany

---

‼️ SHIPPING NOW ‼️

The self-titled vinyl comes in two versions

Majestic Edition

============

Black and yellow swirl with gold splatter

180 gram heavy weight vinyl

Single sleeve with 3mm spine

Full color double sided insert with a special note!

Black polylined innersleeve

33 rpm heaviness

Also includes one of three hand made charcoal drawings made by Burghart .

Limited to 500 copies

TMGT Edition

===========

Black & yellow merge

180 gram heavy weight vinyl

Single sleeve with 3mm spine

Full color double sided insert with a special note!

Black polylined innersleeve

33 rpm heaviness

Also includes one of three hand made charcoal drawings made by Burghart .

Limited to 500 copies

Tracklisting:

==========

Side A:

The Swell

Mustache

River Silt

Side B

They're Burying Me Alive

Desert Red

Woman of Hate

Steve Moss - Guitar, Vocals, Bass

Brandon Burghart - Drums

Joseph Hester - Vocals Track 6 / Laurel Morgan -Violin Track 6 / Jesse Henkensiefken - Cello Track 6 / Edward Jackson - Vocals Track 5 /Jake Levin - Vocals, Drums Track 3

Music and lyrics written, produced, engineered, and recorded by Steve Moss and Brandon Burghart

Mastered by Jerry Tubb at Terra Nova Digital Audio Inc. Austin, Texas

NOTE: These photos are mockups and the end result may differ some.

The Midnight Ghost Train by The Midnight Ghost Train

Incl. 25% Swedish VAT

DISCLAIMER: MAJESTIC MOUNTAIN RECORDS SHIPS EXCLUSIVELY WITH VINYL OUTSIDE OF THE LP JACKET TO PREVENT SEAM SPLITS OR ANY OTHER KIND OF INTERNAL DAMAGE DURING TRANSIT TO MAKE SURE YOUR ORDER ARRIVES SAFELY. ALL ORDERS ARE SECURELY PACKED, HOWEVER, WE CANNOT BE HELD ACCOUNTABLE FOR ANY POSSIBLE MISSTREATMENT THE PACKAGE MAY ENDURE DURING TRANSPORT TO YOU. WE DON'T ISSUE REFUNDS OR SEND REPLACEMENT COPIES FOR MINOR ISSUES SUCH AS BEND CORNERS, BACKGROUND NOISE OR THE OCCASIONAL CRACKLE IN THE SOUND. PLEASE, BE ADVISED THAT WE EXAMINE EACH ITEM CAREFULLY AND THEY ARE IN PRISTINE VISUAL CONDITION UPON DEPARTURE FROM OUR MAJESTIC LAIR.
